survey_name: Customer Preferences for Smart Luggage Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and priorities when it comes to smart luggage features, helping manufacturers and retailers better align their product offerings with market demand.

questions.question_text: How often do you travel by air annually?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment respondents based on travel frequency, which may influence their interest in smart luggage features.

script.question_text: How often do you travel by air annually?

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart luggage features are most important to you? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Proximity alerts (e.g., when separated from luggage)
questions.client_notes: This multiple-choice question helps identify priority features for product development. Consider randomizing the option order to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkboxes (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with open text.
